name: PugAmour
description:
PUG AMOUR

A GAME BY ISABELLA BONAZZA, DANIEL PIERI & TAREK TABET

A pug named Vincent Van Pugh has just moved to a new house in France his owner is unpacking when Vincent Van Pugh sees a beautiful female French Bulldog. Vincent Van Pugh's goal is to get his owner to walk him so he can go and meet the beautiful bulldog, Brigette Bardoge.

Very short game. Please comment if you would like to see more stages.

THANK YOU AND ENJOY!

TWITTER: @Amourpug

Feedback Welcome.
